column4: hello my name is jon .and i need to know what i need to have as far  as plung-ins so i can look at tvshows that are on website's .like cbs.com and nbc.com and also hulu.com.plese somebody help me out .i may need one on one help
the main one you will need is flashplugin-installer.  to install it, at a terminal, type: 'sudo apt-get install flashplugin-installer'
